name: Elements Sandbox Game
description:
Have fun and relax while you play a fun and engaging elements game. Have elements interact and study how they change. More elements will be added later! Have fun!

How to Play

Click the buttons on the bottom of the screen to select an element, then left-click in the sandbox area to place it! Hold right-click button to enable eraser to delete elements! Go to the menu (Located in the upper-right corner) to see controls and a list of elements in the game!
